flightGetETicket.data:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>

<style>
    body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
        font-weight: 400;
        color: #333333;
        font-size: 14px;
    }

    a {
        color: #42b549;
        text-decoration: none;
    }

    ol {
        padding: 0;
    }

    .main__wrapper {
        width: 21cm;
        background-color: #FFF;
        margin: auto;
        position: relative;
    }


    hr {
        border: none;
        border-top: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
    }

    .c-38 {
        color: #868686;
    }

    .c-54 {
        color: #757575;
    }

    .c-70 {
        color: #363636;
    }

    .fs-17 {
        font-size: 17px;
    }

    .fs-12 {
        font-size: 12px;
    }

    .fs-11 {
        font-size: 11px;
    }

    .fs-10 {
        font-size: 10px;
    }

    .mr-5 {
        margin-right: 5px;
    }

    .mr-12 {
        margin-right: 12px;
    }

    .mt--3 {
        margin-top: -3px;
    }

    .mt-4 {
        margin-top: 4px;
    }

    .mt-3 {
        margin-top: 3px;
    }

    .mt-8 {
        margin-top: 8px;
    }

    .mt-18 {
        margin-top: 18px;
    }

    .mt-32 {
        margin-top: 32px;
    }

    .mb-8 {
        margin-bottom: 8px;
    }

    .mb-16 {
        margin-bottom: 16px;
    }

    .my-8 {
        margin-top: 8px;
        margin-bottom: 8px;
    }

    .my-20 {
        margin-top: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .h-32 {
        height: 32px;
    }

    .block {
        display: block;
    }

    .inline-block {
        display: inline-block;
    }

    .fw-700 {
        font-weight: 700;
    }

    .va-top {
        vertical-align: top;
    }

    .va-middle {
        vertical-align: middle;
    }

    .color-green {
        color: #42b549;
    }

    .relative {
        position: relative;
    }

    .clock-icon {
        display: inline-block;
        width: 18px;
        height: 18px;
        background-position: center;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-size: 100%;
        background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    }

    .lh-18 {
        line-height: 18px;
    }

    .f-italic {
        font-style: italic;
    }

    .order-id {
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #949394;
        float: right;
        margin-top: 6px;
    }

    .flight__detail {
        margin-top: 8px;
    }

    .note-time {
        text-align: right;
        font-size: 10px;
    }

    .sub-head {
        font-size: 11px;
        margin-top: 24px;
    }

    .sub-head:nth-child(5) {
        margin-top: 8px;
    }

    .airlines__detail {
        width: 100%;
        background-color: #FCFCFC;
        border: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
        border-radius: 4px;
        position: relative;
    }

    .airlines__logo {
        width: 24%;
        display: inline-block;
        vertical-align: middle;
        padding: 8px;
    }

    .airlines__logo:after {
        content: '';
        display: inline-block;
        width: 1px;
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 27%;
        border-right: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
    }

    .airlines__route {
        padding-left: 3%;
        width: 50%;
        display: inline-block;
        vertical-align: middle;
        position: relative;
        padding-top: 10px;
        padding-bottom: 10px;
    }

    .airlines__code {
        width: 16.8%;
        float: right;
        padding-top: 13px;
        padding-left: 7px;
        border-radius: 0 0 0 4px;
        vertical-align: top;
        border-width: 0 0 1px 1px;
        border-style: solid;
        border-color: #E0E0E0;
    }

    .airlines__img {
        width: 100%;
        border: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
        border-radius: 4px;
        margin: auto;
        background-color: #FFF;
        padding: 1px;
    }

    .airlines__img img {
        width: 80%;
        margin: auto;
        border-radius: 4px;
        display: inherit;
    }

    .route__time-to,
    .route__time-from {
        display: inline-block;
        vertical-align: top;
        font-size: 11px;
        color: #757575;
        margin-top: 3px;
        width: 15%;
        margin-right: 10%;
    }

    .route__time {
        margin-left: 26.5%;
    }

    .refundable-tag {
        padding: 3px 6px;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 9px;
        border: 1px solid #42b549;
        border-radius: 4px;
        color: #42b549;
    }

    .route__indicator {
        display: inline-block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 15px;
        bottom: 50px;
        width: 1px;
        left: 23%;
        border-right: 1px dashed #E0E0E0;
    }

    .route__indicator:after {
        content: '';
        display: inline-block;
        width: 10px;
        height: 10px;
        padding: 0;
        margin: 0;
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: -3.6px;
        background-color: green;
        border-radius: 50%;
    }

    .route__indicator:before {
        content: '';
        display: inline-block;
        width: 10px;
        height: 10px;
        padding: 0;
        margin: 0;
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: -3.6px;
        background-color: green;
        border-radius: 50%;
    }

    .route__transit {
        border-width: 1px 0 1px 0;
        border-style: solid;
        border-color: #E0E0E0;
        padding: 8px;
    }

    .ticker-warning {
        background-color: #fffdec;
        border-radius: 4px;
        border: 1px solid #ECDA77;
        display: inline-block;
        width: 100%;
        text-align: center;
        padding: 6px 10px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
        -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    .passenger__detail {
        margin-top: 32px;
    }

    .passenger__table {
        border-collapse: collapse;
        margin-top: 8px;
        table-layout: fixed;
    }

    .passenger__table thead tr {
        border-width: 1px 0 1px 0;
        border-color: #E0E0E0;
        border-style: solid;
    }

    .passenger__table thead tr td {
        padding: 8px 10px;
        font-size: 11px;
        color: #434343;
    }

    .passenger__table tbody tr td {
        padding: 10px 10px;
        color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .54);
        word-wrap: break-word;
    }


    .term-logo__img {
        width: 80px;
        height: 50px;
        text-align: center;
        border: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
        border-radius: 4px;
        background-color: #FFF;
    }

    .term-logo__img img {
        width: 75px;
    }

    .term-link {
        display: inline-block;
        width: 400px;
        white-space: nowrap;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .cancelation_list {
        word-break: break-all;
        padding-left: 13px;
    }

    .cancelation_list li {
        padding-top: 2px;
        padding-left: 2px;
    }

	#header {
		margin: auto;
		width: 21cm;
		margin-bottom: 24px;
	}

    #footer {
		width: 21cm;
		border-top: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
		padding-top: 16px;
		margin: auto;
	}

	#footer > div {
		display: inline-block;
	}

	.contact__wrapper {
		width: 49%;
		vertical-align: top;
	}

	.medsoc__wrapper {
		width: 15%;
		vertical-align: top;
		text-align: left;
	}

	.app__wrapper {
		width: 34.5%;
		vertical-align: bottom;
		text-align: right;
	}

	.fs-10 {
		font-size: 10px;
	}

	.fw-700 {
		font-weight: 700;
	}

	.c-38 {
		color: #868686;
	}

	.h-20 {
		height: 24px;
	}

	.h-50 {
		height: 50px;
	}

	.tokopedia-flight {
		display: inline-block;
		width: 300px;
		height: 60px;
		background-position: center;
		background-repeat: no-repeat;
		background-size: 100%;
		background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
	}
</style>

<meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=0.3" name="viewport" />

</head>
<body>
    <div id="header">
        <div class="tokopedia-flight"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="h-32"></div>
    <div class="main__wrapper">
            <div class="flight__detail">
                <div class="fs-16 inline-block" style="width: 400px">
                    Flight Detail / <em>Detail Penerbangan</em>
                </div>
                <div class="order-id" style="width: 250px;text-align: right">
                    Tokopedia Order ID: QKG-0NUCX-SMG1
                </div>
                <hr>
                <div class="note-time c-38">
                    *All time displayed are local airport time / <em>Waktu yang tertera adalah waktu lokal pada bandara</em>
                </div>

                

                <div class="sub-head c-38">
                    Flight Date / <em>Tanggal Penerbangan</em>
                </div>
                <div class="fs-12 c-70 mt-4 mb-16">
                    Friday, 04 December 2020 / <em>Jumat, 04 Desember 2020</em>
                </div>
                <div class="airlines__detail">
                    
                        <div class="airlines__detail-row relative">
                            <div class="airlines__logo">
                                <div class="airlines__img">
                                    <img src="">
                                </div>
                                <div class="my-8">
                                    <span class="block fs-10 c-38">Airline / Maskapai</span>
                                    <span class="block fs-11 c-54 fw-700">Susi Air</span>
                                </div>
                                <div class="my-8">
                                    <span class="block fs-10 c-38">Flight No. / No. Penerbangan</span>
                                    <span class="block fs-11 c-54 fw-700">SI - 101</span>
                                </div>
                                
                            </div>
                            <div class="airlines__route">
                                <div class="route__indicator"></div>
                                <div class="route__from">
                                    <span class="route__time-from">
                                        06:00
                                    </span>
                                    <span class="inline-block va-top c-54">
                                        <span class="fs-11 fw-700">Jakarta (CGK)</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span class="fs-10">Soekarno Hatta</span>
                                        
                                        <br>
                                        <span class="fs-10">Terminal X1</span>
                                        
                                    </span>
                                </div>
                                <div class="route__time my-20 fs-10 c-54">
                                    <span class="clock-icon va-middle mr-5 mt--3"></span>
                                    2 jam
                                     
                                </div>
                                <div class="route__to">
                                    <span class="route__time-to">
                                        08:00
                                        
                                    </span>
                                    <span class="inline-block va-top c-54">
                                        <span class="fs-11 fw-700">Denpasar (DPS)</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span class="fs-10">Ngurah Rai</span>
                                        
                                        <br>
                                        <span class="fs-10">Terminal Z1</span>
                                        
                                    </span>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="airlines__code">
                                <div class="fs-10 c-38">
                                    Kode Booking (PNR)
                                </div>
                                <div class="color-green my-8">
                                    DUMMY294
                                </div>
                                <div class="h-32">
                                    <span class="refundable-tag">
                                        
                                            Refundable
                                        
                                    </span>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                    
                </div>
                
                <div class="passenger__detail">
                    <div class="c-70">
                        Passenger Details / <em>Detail Penumpang</em>
                    </div>
                    <table class="passenger__table" width="100%">
                        <thead>
                            <tr class="va-top">
                                <td width="8%">
                                    No.
                                </td>
                                <td width="27%">
                                    Passenger's Name <br/>
                                    <em>Nama Penumpang</em>
                                </td>
                                <td width="18%">
                                    Ticket Number <br/>
                                    <em>Nomor Tiket</em>
                                </td>
                                <td width="12%">
                                    Route<br/>
                                    <em>Rute</em>
                                </td>
                                <td width="13%">
                                    Baggage<br/>
                                    <em>Bagasi</em>
                                </td>
                                <td width="22%">
                                    Meal<br/>
                                    <em>Makanan</em>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tbody class="fs-12">
                            
                            <tr>
                                <td class="va-top">1.</td>
                                <td class="fw-700 c-54 va-top">Tn. Hefdy Wiguna elprama</td>
                                <td class="va-top">TICKET125</td>
                                <td colspan="3">
                                    
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            
                        </tbody>
                    </table>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="mt-32">
                <div class="c-70">
                    Terms & Condition / <em>Syarat dan Ketentuan</em>
                    <hr>
                </div>
                <div class="fs-12 c-70 mt-8">
                    <div>Please read and understand the respective airline's Terms and Conditions.</div>
                    <div>Mohon membaca dan memahami Syarat dan Ketentuan yang berlaku pada maskapai terkait</div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="mt-32 mb-16">
                    <div class="c-70">
                        Cancellation / <em>Pembatalan</em>
                        <hr>
                    </div>
                    <div class="mt-4 fs-12 lh-18 c-70">
                        <ol class="cancelation_list">
                            <li>Buka aplikasi Tokopedia di handphone-mu.</li>
                            <li>Pilih 'Tiket Pesawat'.</li>
                            <li>Masuk ke 'Daftar Transaksi'.</li>
                            <li>Pilihlah tiket pesawat yang ingin kamu batalkan.</li>
                            <li>Pilih detail dari penumpang dan rute yang ingin kamu batalkan.</li>
                            <li>Klik 'Permohonan Pembatalan Tiket'.</li>
                            <li>Pihak Tokopedia akan memproses permohonan pembatalan tiket dan menginformasikan tahapan selanjutnya yang harus kamu lakukan.</li>
                        </ol>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-32">
                <div class="c-70">
                    Kebijakan Pembatalan & Refund / <i>Cancellation & Refund Policy</i>
                    <hr>
                </div>
                
                <div class="c-70 mb-8">
                    Susi Air
                    <a href="#" class="color-green">https://www.tokopedia.com/help/browse/t-0074</a>
                </div>
                
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="h-50"></div>
        <div id="footer">
            <div class="contact__wrapper">
                <div class="fs-10 fw-700 c-38">Contact</div>
                <a href="https://www.tokopedia.com/help">www.tokopedia.com/help</a>
            </div>
            <div class="medsoc__wrapper">
                <div class="fs-10 fw-700 c-38">Media Sosial</div>
                <a href="http://eoaclk.com/Ow382vvrBi/"><img src="https://s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/tokopedia-internetmarketing/Email/Old/FB.png" alt="Facebook" height="22"></a>
                <a href="http://eoaclk.com/W1zNWwgVGs"><img src="https://s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/tokopedia-internetmarketing/Email/Old/Twitter.png" alt="Twitter" height="22"></a>
                <a href="http://eoaclk.com/B0yewkotPn"><img src="https://s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/tokopedia-internetmarketing/Email/Old/IG.png" alt="Instagram" height="22"></a>
            </div>
            <div class="app__wrapper">
                <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/tokopedia-jual-beli-online/id1001394201?mt=8"><img src="https://s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/tokopedia-internetmarketing/Email/Old/AppStore.jpg" alt="Appstore" height="35"></a>
                <a href="http://app.appsflyer.com/com.tokopedia.tkpd?pid=Gmail_Sponsored_Promotion&c=Email"><img src="https://s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/tokopedia-internetmarketing/Email/Old/GppglePlay.png" alt="Playstore" height="35"></a>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="h-20"></div>

<script type="text/javascript" >var _cf = _cf || []; _cf.push(['_setFsp', true]);  _cf.push(['_setBm', true]);  _cf.push(['_setAu', '/libraries/ec6e16a16no203f7bada3705655c235']); </script><script type="text/javascript"  src="/libraries/ec6e16a16no203f7bada3705655c235"></script></body>
</html>
